content.title: Fans and stars descend on Comic Con 2024

content.title: The ultra-girly movement sparking debate
content.description: Frilly, hyper-feminine and cute with bows everywhere, coquette style is increasingly popular. As an aesthetic, is it a problematic trend – or fun and empowering?

blocks.altText: Coquette girls wearing bows and lace  (Getty Images)

content.description: From the Steven Spielberg classic Jaws, to predators stalking the Seine in Under Paris, there is no shortage of shark films.

content.title: These 'eye-popping' medieval tales pushed sexual boundaries

content.title: The controversy over Paris's Olympic village

content.title: 'He was after my life': WW1 soldier's confession

content.title: 'I only learnt to know her through her diary'

content.title: The blacklisted Hollywood writer who won two Oscars
